page.title: 13THE SCHOOL YEAR by Joe 9yrs
page.content: The annual school events are the Christmas Party,Carol Service or the Christmas Concert,Spring Fair,School Trip,Sports Day,Sponsored Swim,Infants Music Festival,Summer Concert and Open Afternoon.At the CHRISTMAS PARTY we go into the hall and watch some cartoons. Then we go into the class and have a party meal.Then a pretend Santa comes and gives everyone a present.For the CAROL SERVICE we go into the church and sing carols.Atthe CONCERT we learn a play and then act it out.The SPRING FAIR is mainly raffles and a jumble sale.There are also running races,a tug of war,dog tricks and horse rides. For the SCHOOL TRIP we go to lots of different places.For SPORTS DAY we have lots of different races.At the SPONSORED SWIM people collect sponsors who swim as far as possible in the school pool.
